#BlackMagicCraft #Episode198 #DungeonTiles

Thanks to Loke BattleMats for sponsoring this video! Grab one of their cool battle mat books from your favourite retailer or visit them at:http://www.lokebattlemats.com

In this video I show you how you can turn something as simple as disposable styrofoam plates into great looking dungeon tiles that are durable and low profile enough to use as a travelling GM!

title: I made cheap DUNGEON TILES using disposable plates!
